item.description:
WEST’s Job Interviews: The Art & Strategy of Succcess Workshop
When: Thursday, February 17, from 5:30 p.m. to 9:00 p.m.
Where: Riverfront Office Park, One Main Street, Cambridge, MA
Host: Women Entrepreneurs in Science and Technology (WEST)
Register: www.WESTorg.org
Interviewing is a vital skill for succeeding in the world of science and technology. If 10 or 100 people are interviewing for the job you want, what puts you over the top and out in front? Understanding the purpose and outcome of each interview will give you a powerful edge in achieving your goals. This lively, interactive workshop will focus on improving your ability to ask for informational interviews and make them productive. It will take the mystery out of key aspects of job interviewing, and teach you concrete skills for reaching out to others so you can achieve your full potential. Light dinner and refreshments included. This event is open to the public - everyone is welcome to attend!
item.name: WEST’s Job Interviews: The Art & Strategy of Succcess Workshop
